title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE40001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsTurbulence modeling and Numerical Solution of Navier-Stokes Equations for turbulent flows, Application of CFD methods to stability and acoustic problems, ENO and DRP schemes, Introduction to multiphase/multi-component, Introduction to weighted residual methods in CFD and applications.
